website_summaries.verdict: It's somewhat minimalistic, but for the grill master who demands only the best, these utensils fit the bill perfectly.
pros: Solid brushed stainless-steel utensils offer unrivaled durability that's backed by a lifetime guarantee
Strong and sturdy, there's no worry of these bending or breaking
Ergonomic handles come complete with contoured rubber grips for comfort
Precision crafted for the highest levels of functionality, whether you're grilling hefty steaks or delicate fish
cons: Comes with considerably fewer pieces than others

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: "Best tongs ever" says my husband. We've used this set on steaks, hamburgers, frozen wings, chicken breasts, and whatever else we've grilled. We've tried other tongs with frozen wings and they have issues gripping, but these tongs had no issue. This set is sturdy and seems like it will hold up over time. I like that I can just throw them in the dishwasher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MysticPizzaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY BBQ Tool Set. EXTRA THICK from Alpha Grillers.
customer_reviews.text: The tongs!!!!! The best I have ever owned. Alright the whole set is great,.... but those tongs. I'm able to pick-up 1/2 of an elk backstrap. Arrived on time,..... and I think the item is better than the seller described. Extra thick,..... is just that,..... extra thick! Love the lock on the tongs. The seller even set me detailed instructions on how to operate the lock system while I was waiting to receive the item. Would recommend this set of BBQ tools to anyone who BBQ's. I will buy this set again if they wear out,.... but I doubt they are going to. Alpha Grillers hit the nail on the head with these BBQ Tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy stainless bbq set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of barbecue grilling tools. They are heavy and very sturdy and have a nice rubber grip on them. I have used and washed them several times and they are holding up nicely. I especially like the turner with the serrated edge.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Great appearance but poorly manufactured but...great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The "one piece" spatula in the set separated. Yep, the handle separated from the blade on a poorly manufactured one-piece utensil. Feel ripped off having paid a premium price for substandard quality. Have had the set for seven months and used the spatula maybe a half-dozen times on the grill. ****update**** I contacted the seller and they sent a replacement right away. Fantastic customer service. Rating back up to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: M&S

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best tongs
customer_reviews.text: I was suspicious when another reviewer wrote that these are the best tongs on the market, but he wasn't wrong. They're long and sturdy and very satisfying to clack together in the general direction of your spouse, while chasing them. The spatula is wide enough for the fattest burger. All the utensils have a great "hand feel" with molded rubber handles. They're all unusually large, but that isn't really a problem, except for storage. If you have large man hands you will appreciate these.
customer_reviews.author: Lanier Basenberg

customer_reviews.title: These tools are perfect. The build quality is incredible and since I've ...
customer_reviews.text: These tools are perfect. The build quality is incredible and since I've bought several different set of tools off Amazon, these are the best by far in my humble opinion. The tongs were a bit to break in but now they're fantastic and snappy. The fact that we can crack open bottles of beer easily without having to install something on my grill or keep a bottle opener there is an added bonus. I absolutely love this set and am buying a second set for a gift for my grilling enthusiast friends.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Vialva

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heavy Duty BBQ Tools
customer_reviews.text: This set exceeded my expectations. The tools are oversized - nice, long handles so I don’t burn my hand while I’m basting or turning an item I’m grilling. Because they’re stainless, I put them in the dishwasher when I’m done and they wash up beautifully. I expected they would be smaller, and potentially flimsy, but they’re not - great size and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Both Professional and Fun

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Long
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Tools are heavy duty. Spatula blade is large. All the handles are long and comfortable. I've had no issues with the tongs. Hanging loops will fit any and all of my grills. They are stainless and clean easily. I'm a little concerned about the black plastic like material on the back of all of the tools near the top. Hoping that it won't deteriorate or fall off. So far, it seems to be well attached and not prone to deterioration. I'm sold on the length and the sturdiness of these tools and expect them to last as long as my Weber grills
customer_reviews.author: Martin H JacobyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.text: High quality no doubt about that. Only complaint is that the tongs have an arbitrary limit to how far they will open and that makes it difficult to turn larger roasts.
customer_reviews.author: UrKungFuNoGood

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality and is now officially better than the Weber set because the tongs in the new style Weber set has curved up tips and you can't easily slide it under what you want to pull off the grill or turn. The Alpha Grillers set is just like the old style Weber. This even came with a silicone tipped basting brush! When grilling, no one likes a cheap tool set, this would be a good Christmas gift set for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: bargainshopper

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best set of grilling tools I have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best set of grilling tools I have ever used. They not only feel great in my hand, but they are also incredibly sturdy and strong feeling. I've already used them about a dozen times and they have held up beautifully. I even take them to my parents place when we have a family bbq since I'm in charge of the grill and the tools my dad has are very flimsy and essentially bend when you look at them. Cant say enough about how amazing these bbq tools are!
customer_reviews.author: CristinaY

customer_reviews.title: Quality Set That Seems To Be Able To Stand Up To Abuse
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase this set for my 20 something year old son for Christmas since we bought him a small grill in the Spring. I liked the thickness of the set, seems to be very heavy duty. Plus, since they are stainless steel without rubber or wood handles, he can pop them into the dishwasher without ruining the handles. This was the main reason I bought them - they look like they can take abuse from someone who isn't going to handwash them. Company customer service was awesome - they followed up to be sure I received my set. All in all, a good set for the money. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones to get
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and another set that looked exactly the same but came with a storage pouch. The ones with the pouch were slightly lighter gauge and the tongs were flimsy, so was the fork. This set is far superior. I'll spend another $10 on a storage pouch and keep this heavier set.
customer_reviews.author: S. Switzer

customer_reviews.title: Remarkably good!
customer_reviews.text: These handsome barbecue tools came beautifully presented in their box, and are the best I have ever had. They are sturdy, weighty and very well-made. The long handles prevent my hands from getting hot over our gas grill, and their generous size makes for ease of use. They all hang successfully on the side of our grill when not in use, and it's so easy to wash sticky residue off them. I certainly recommend them, and they would make the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gramcrackergran

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable and well designed
customer_reviews.text: They perform as advertised... strong and durable for lifting heavy items with confidence. That was my top concern and it is totally met. There was a lot of real-life design put into these with things like locking tongs, a knife and bottle opener built into the spatula, and all parts have handy, easy to use hanging loops. I believe these will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alan V

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and dishwasher safe. Should last decades
customer_reviews.text: I did really like it. Very large sized appliances, very easy to clean and dishwasher-safe is a must. Hangs well on grill and fits into cabinets easily for storage. Basic features, such as tong locks and hooks look to be all very sturdy. Some extra features, such as the serrated edge on the spatula, are nice but I don't personally use them due to porcelain-coated grills. Only negative was the packaging arrived a bit messy with the box slightly crushed, but that's not really against the product itself and the utensils were unaffected.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy gauge and they look as good as they are made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on some of the reviews I read and doing some research. After looking at the larger all in kits this is a better. Those other kits usually compromise on the quality of some of the components such as gloves, meat shreddars, etc. I concur with the positive reviews that these are made very well with heavy stainless steel. I am happy with the look and feel. They are a great match to my Treigar 34 inch grill and expect many years of use from them. I think you can buy these with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Cubano

customer_reviews.title: Big hit at the Super Bowl cookout!!!!!  Neighbors gonna buy a set too.
customer_reviews.text: I rcvd the grilling tool set in record time......and just in time for Super Bowl cookout. They arrived in good shape too....no defects or broken missing parts. I must say the quality is great, they feel good in my hand and performed without flaw.....love them and look fwd to my next grilling experience and the opportunity to put them to the task again. On another note: the folks at Alpha Grillers sent a preemptive email with creating and additional info for if or when the tongs might need a little adjusting. Didn't need them as of now son I printed them and placed it in my 'grill' folder for future use..... Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow Super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for heavy duty BBQ utensils. the tongs and spatulas I had before couldn't hold the weight of a brisket. when I received these, I was immediately impressed by the weight of these utensils. quality was excellent. I had no problem using it on a 15 pound brisket. the handles are also fairly long so I don't burn my arm when reaching toward the back of the BBQ. Great tools and must have for BBQ
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B.

customer_reviews.title: "Industrial strength" BBQ tools/weapons
customer_reviews.text: If the term "industrial strength" could be applied to BBQ grilling tools then the term can easily be applied here. They are extremely sturdy, feel good and weighty in the hand. As an added bonus, I feel they could be used in self defense to fend off a backyard intruder without missing a beat at the grill. Jason Bourne wishes he had these in a pinch. These are a steal at $30.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Mite

customer_reviews.title: Big Sturdy Utensils
customer_reviews.text: This multi-utensil product arrived in nice packaging that is easy to wrap if you were to give this item as a gift. I ordered it for myself because I wanted a nice set to use with my new grill I recently purchased. If you are looking for easy to handle sturdy utensils, then look no further. This set is exactly what you are looking for, and the price can't get any better.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best tongs out there
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a gift for a friend. He has a lot of grilling experience and he claims that the tongs in the set are the best he has used. I spent a lot of time looking for the most sturdy grilling set out there and settled on this one -- and that appears to be a good decision. So many sets are very low quality, stamped out of thin gauge sheet metal, but these have some real heft to them.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. They feel cheap and the tongs have zero spring in them. I’m returning the set.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid BBQ grilling set. The utensils ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid BBQ grilling set. The utensils are large, heavy and well made. I personally hand wash and dry immediately as to not risk rusting but they are listed as rust free. I could do without the serrated edge on the spatula as I prefer to use a knife. It honestly just ends up tearing up my sponges and steel wool.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like its superior quality since its heavy and pretty damn ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty set. Feels like its superior quality since its heavy and pretty damn solid. I have been using it on my small patio grill and its perfect. I can imagine it would be good for any grill of any size.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Kim

customer_reviews.title: Super Awesome.. Bought for the Tongs.. very satisfied with the set!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this set just for the tongs...I love this product.. probably some of the best tongs i have ever used for grilling. They hold up very well especially to the weights of meat that i am grilling. many tongs fold under pressure or weight especially with larger cuts of meat like full racks of ribs etc..additionally the length is perfect for reaching the back of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: B. TALBOTT

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these tools is excellent. My minute complaint is that they seem needlessly over sized to me. This makes them harder to fit in a dishwasher, more difficult to have from the hills on my grill and more difficult to store then on the grill with a cover. The materials used seem to be very high quality, I expect them to last question a while, and the warranty is fantastic if they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Eli S.

customer_reviews.title: A great affordable grill kit
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this kit. The tools are super heavy duty and feel like they will sustain a fair amount of abuse. The stainless steel means I don't need to worry about leaving them outside or tossing them in he dishwasher. The brushed texture is sophisticated and I feel fancy using these tools. This is the upgrade to my grill set up I've been waiting to treat myself to.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Denish

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in the hand - sure on the grip/flip - ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable in the hand - sure on the grip/flip - these tools are a great addition to my B-B-Qing. I like that the tongs collapse for storage and the spatula is heavy duty enough to not bend when you use it. The fork is also strong enough to comfortably turn any size piece of meat. Well balanced, expertly made and easy to use -- what else can I say!
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality BBQ Tools
customer_reviews.text: The weight, length, quality and size of these is outstanding. I’m a BBQ & smoker enthusiast and these are by far the best quality BBQ tools I ever owned. I don’t know how they could be any better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to handle! Not very heat resisted at grip
customer_reviews.text: The tools are very beautiful but are lacking in a practical aspect. I have a Webber charcoal grill that has a two hooks built in for hanging tools such as these. When hanging these tools, heat travels right through the handle and they were impossible to pick up and use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We wanted solid, quality BBQ tools, as we use our grill and smoker all the time. We were glad upon receipt to see how heavy duty these are, but bummed to see that the handle had separated on the fork. I responded to the Alpha Grillers email that was sent after I ordered this product and let them know the issue. They responded within minutes and immediately offered a full refund or a new set. We received our new set within days and everything is perfect. Even though one of the items was initially defective the customer service completely turned it around for us, and we would order them all over again. Good product, even better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: player0001

customer_reviews.title: grilling tools
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the good reviews, we decided on this product to complement our new grill. The product arrived promptly, was well packaged, and the packaging would have been appropriate for gifting. All the items seem to be heavy duty and well made. We received an email from seller with tips on how to best use the items and an extra utensil ( basting brush) was included in the set. We are very satisfied with the performance of all items.
customer_reviews.author: don holland

customer_reviews.title: Happy So Far
customer_reviews.text: I just received this as a gift for my husband. We haven't had a chance to use them yet but they seem very sturdy. The fact they can go in the dishwasher is an added plus! If they work as good as they look, these will last us for a very long time. Love the long handles. They seem very, very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: They're quite large
customer_reviews.text: They're quite large and long... maybe 3-4" longer then I'd expect. The brush is mostly useless, everything else works well. Spatula has a large surface and the edge is a little thicker then I'd like... but it does work fine-- metal is very think, though fork did bend a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, perfectly sized, attractive set of highly functional grilling tools
customer_reviews.text: After three uses in 10 days (including one large party for 15 people), I am even more impressed than when I first opened the package. The tools are easy to use, easy to clean (by hand and then in the dishwasher), and feel like they’ll last a long time. I wish a grill brush was part of the set, but that’s not a ding on these. Rather, due to the quality of this set, I think Alpha Grillers would probably make a fantastic brush as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: litmusrex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and feel good in your hand. I know that sounds weird but most grill tools are uncomfortable when using. The metal tongs are easy to close and pick up food. The metal flipper is very nice and includes a serrated edge, which is a nice convenience. Excellent quality and a must have for grilling. These are going to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary set of utensils  and exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the strength of stainless steel equipment for handling large sized steaks and ease of use for more delicate items like fish. Length of all pieces helps avoid cooking yourself along with the food on the grill and the innovative spatula "Flip, cut and hydrate" is not only effective, but its unlike any other manufacturer out there that I know of.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wentink

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grill set
customer_reviews.text: This grill set is amazing. This is a sturdy solid metal set with easy clean features and easy to use instructions. The spatula. Comes. It only with that but hiden gems. Of a cutting side and a bottle opener. They all even have a hanging option to that they can be reached or hung from the grill in an easy time of need. Definitely feel like they will last compared to other name brand options you can get at the store. The extra long baster make it easy to safely reach all of your coming meat on the grill so you don't get burned.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Demler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tools!
customer_reviews.text: We have a very large grill and were looking for some substantial, well crafted tools to use with it. These fit the bill perfectly. They have a nice weight to them, look great and work perfectly. We're very happy with this purchase and would not hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: mngma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality grill tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high quality set if barbeque grilling tools. They gave a good weight and long handles that exudes quality as well as a place to hang them right on the grill. These definitely seem like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed by the quality of the four tools. Not only do they look good (which really is not that important), but they are well built. All of the tools are sturdy and work perfectly. The locking tongs are what sold me on this set. I'm happy with the purchase and I feel like they are a great deal for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: G.L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Grilling Utensils!
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing! The quality is fantastic! These are so heavy-duty and sturdy and very big. It leaves a good distance from the grill and you also get a good grip on the meat you’re rotating! I can’t foresee any reason why we wouldn’t have this grill set for a long time. My husband is so happy to finally have a quality grill set!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: This set of grill tools is really heavy duty, I was surprised just how good the quality was for the price. I had a cheap pair of tongs that would bend making it hard to grasp items off the grill. Not a problem with these at all. Looks nice and the hoops on the handles are big enough to fit on the side hooks of my Weber. The manufacturer even sent me a nice email with some tips for maintenance and contact info in case I have any issues at all. Very pleased with my purchase, would definitely buy from Alpha Grillers again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband who has turned into a grilling freak after getting a Traeger pellet grill. He said these are the best grilling tools that he has ever had. They are very durable and look nice. Would make the perfect gift. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: CyberShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great set of utensils that doesn’t bend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set that doesn’t bend! I have a hard time with grill tools because I use grill baskets a lot. The baskets get heavy and if I try to pick them up with the tongs, the tongs tend to bend. But not with these! The spatula is heavy duty as well! Can’t recommend this set enough!
customer_reviews.author: Andy H

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grill-a-holics!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother who is a grill-a-holic. He absolutely loves them. He said they were the perfect length. They also had some handy features like the bottle opener built into the spatula and the stainless finish is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy-duty quality. Long enough to get your hands away from the heat. Rubber grips prevent heat transfer. Best I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D

customer_reviews.title: Simply Floored
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a 5 star guy, but this set is amazing. You don't need all the nonsense that the cheap sets offer. This is stainless, dishwasher safe and only includes what you'd use. They're extremely well built, heavy duty and fairly priced. Honest, one of the best purchases I've ever made. Any serious or weekend griller will love this set.
customer_reviews.author: B-lo

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for the Grille Master in Your Life
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a gift for the grille master in your life, this is a great choice. The tools are substantial, and they are nicely boxed for gift giving. The set contains the essentials for grilling, and they are even made with little places on the ends to make hanging them up easy, if that is the way you like to store your tools. They are not small, so they will require significant drawer space, if that is how you choose to store them.
customer_reviews.author: Charice Handford

customer_reviews.title: It's a BBQ tool set. It is excellent at what it does.
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've picked up BBQ tools from whatever was on clearance at one of the big retail chains. I actually did a little research before I bought this current set and was happy I did. I have found them to be incredibly strong and functional with anything I've grilled on my BBQ. Overall this is a nice set and I'm glad I put a bit more time into researching before settling on these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Orpheus82

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and well made. Arrived quickly. Seller sent me an email/video describing a quick fix for "stuck" tongs some customers complained about. Never had a problem but it demonstrates the seller is proactive in resolving buyer concerns.
customer_reviews.author: DW in PA

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty BBQ Grilling Tools Set
customer_reviews.text: OMG...OMG...what great quality for grilling Tools! I cannot wait for my Brother, the grilling expert to open this heavy duty BBQ Grilling Tools. This is the best quality set and delivery was spot on quick. Thank you for a great product and we know this will be a hit!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Really like
customer_reviews.text: We mostly use the Tongs when we grill and these are great. Nice and tough, for briskets, chops and venison. The whole set is stout which is important for grilling. Would buy these again But won't have to!!
customer_reviews.author: Arkie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nice looking!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tools for grilling. They are long enough to reach anything on the grill, heavy duty and clean up in the dishwasher. I am so happy with this purchase - best set of grilling tools I've had!!
customer_reviews.author: aholloway

customer_reviews.title: Grilling time
customer_reviews.text: These were perhaps the best set that I've ever used. They are very sturdy and has comfortable grips. It made grilling easier.
customer_reviews.author: mike stephens

customer_reviews.title: Well built so they are a joy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I stepped up my grill game and got a Traeger So I needed to step up my so I needed to step up my BBQ tool game as well. This set is solidly built and is fun to use because they feel great in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product! I bought for my husband when he requested a nice grill kit for his birthday after the cheap set we got at Home Depot did not hold up. Very sturdy and easy to clean, the loops make it easy to hang on any grill.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: The Mercedes of BBQ sets
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well-designed, this grill set is of exceptionally high quality. It has nice features like a serrated cutting edge on the spatula for cutting meat or scraping the grill, and a neat lock to keep the tongs in a closed position when hanging or stowing them. I was sent this set free in return for a review, but I was clearly a real winner here, as these are superb tools--worth the price they are listed for on Amazon. And Alpha Grillers gives excellent, personalized customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy22204

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heave stainless utensils. These do not feel cheap in any way and I love the rubberized parts on the handles for comfort. The spatula has a very sharp serrated edge that I'm not sure I'll ever use but it's nice to have in case I do want to. The length is perfect for grilling and the hooks are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Best BBQ Set Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a sturdy, great valued BBQ toolset? This is it. East to clean and very strong, no matter what you have on your grill!
customer_reviews.author: Yamila Ayala

customer_reviews.title: We like this set very much
customer_reviews.text: We like this set very much. They look nice and they function very well. Easy clean up too. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Bell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and look good
customer_reviews.text: I feared based on some review of other similar products of the quality of the materials. The grilling set are a bit pricey but you definitely get what you pay for - quality. The grill set is sturdy and compliments the look of my Traegar grill. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: afnav23

customer_reviews.title: Locking mechanism (on the tongs) seems sturdy and like it will last
customer_reviews.text: Got the Tool Set yesterday. Obvious, high quality/fabrication. Metal doesn't feel cheap or flimsy. Used them last night on my Big Green Egg to cook steaks. Locking mechanism (on the tongs) seems sturdy and like it will last. Tongs are long enough so my arm hairs don't get singed at high temperature. 100% happy with the purchase. Looked at other tool sets but glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: VA Backyard

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, heavy duty, long BBQ utensils. I was so impressed by this set I also bought their grill brush. Pricy but worth it IMO. I won't need new utensils any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Gummy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a spare set for camping/tailgating. Out of the box the pieces felt light but still pretty solid for the money. Not as sturdy as a much more expensive set from Williams Sonoma that was gifted to me, but still, this should serve its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular grill set based on the amazing reviews . These are the best durable and well crafted grilling utensils that I have ever seen. The handles are very long and have a good grip on them. I do wish there was a pouch or case to store all of them in. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shellyo98

customer_reviews.title: They bend and flex with large cuts of meat, pork shoulder, brisket or ribs.
customer_reviews.text: The product description says these are extra heavy duty, we must have a different definition. I have found this ad to be of OK quality but it is certainly not heavy duty. A large slab of ribs will cause these to bend and flex.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great set for frequent bbq’ers....
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the set. He’s used it many times at this point and is very happy I gave him something like this to replace his old “tools”.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne P

customer_reviews.title: Great Fathers Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: I have had many grilling tools, all were very cheesy quality ok for an occasional grilling. This set is made for Professional grillers who constantly use them. They are very high quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Papa1276

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for hubby!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great BBQ set. Impressed with the quality and it looks really nice. Hubs loved it-it was a birthday gift and it did not disappoint. He will get lots of use from it in the years to come.
customer_reviews.author: A. McLean

customer_reviews.title: You can stop looking now. These are it.
customer_reviews.text: Get these. Do it. Very sturdy and sold. These are the ones. The last ones you're going to buy. Gift these, too. They're light years better than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Moll

customer_reviews.title: Stains
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set not even 2 months ago, used it 4 times, and it is already all stained, I have tried everything to clean and cannot do it. I had another set for years and was always able to clean it and looked new. Hope the manufacturer can tell me how to clean or give me my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: "I ordered the grill set and wire brush on Saturday afternoon, and it arrived well-packaged on Sunday, less than 24 hours later. The set is hefty and really well made. All of the pieces feel good in my hand. There are very clear directions on “unspringing” the tongs, oh, and I received two emails from them as follow-ups to make sure everything was exactly what I wanted. Perfect."
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the tools yet, but they seem to be very sturdy and well made. They came in a nice box which I will likely use to store them in. The serrated knife on the spatula seems to be very sharp. High quality product. Worth spending the extra few dollars over other brands. If they don't meet expectations I will surely update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a while to find reasonably priced, sturdy and good looking BBQ grilling tool set for my husband. He LOVES this set! Uses it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: It appeared and turned out to be heavy duty. Have been trying to find a pair of tongs that don't flex when handling something heavier. These did the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Glennbaz

customer_reviews.title: Tongs are now spring loaded
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight sturdy grill utensils. I especially like the spatula as the handle is very thick and you can pick up heavy food off the grill with no worries. Tongs are now spring loaded and also can be used to pickup heavy food.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Only tools you'll ever need to buy!
customer_reviews.text: "The tools were well packaged and arrived on time. I received an email from them checking on how I liked them and if I had any questions" These are very heavy duty grilling tools. Just what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: P. Samson

customer_reviews.title: I’m in Love!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. The quality is great. All utensils are heavy and of a good quality. The turner has a aerated side which is awesome and comes in handy to check doneness without having to use a knife. efinitely will recommend for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Denisehalterman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love how thick they all are. I wanted a quality set that doesn't seem like it's gonna break or bend. Handles are ergonomic and the metal is solid. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rican408

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and sturdy stainless steel so there is no bend in the tools and the tongs aren't like some of the flimsy ones that are out there that are unable to pick up a heavy steak or chicken breast. Definitely would buy again and just might for a gift in the future.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SET!!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, with non slip grips. Every piece is what is needed to assist you with your grilling needs. I threw away my other sets and this is something you can give as a gift for sure.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: The best grilling set I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These utensils are far superior to anything I've ever owned so sturdy well made polished heavy duty handles heavy duty at both ends for that matter
customer_reviews.author: T K

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Utensils in Price Range - By Far!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of outdoor utensils that would last more than one year. These will last many years. Impressive quality. Weight to let you know they mean business.
customer_reviews.author: John Barber

customer_reviews.title: Strong and solidly made. Heavy yet has a quality and comfortable feel in hands.
customer_reviews.text: Strongest and most solid bbq tools I’ve ever used. Simple, classy, and work great. Came with the silicone brush also which I was not sure from other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Pass these down to your kids and grandkids
customer_reviews.text: My experience with other grilling sets led me to believe that there was one standard of quality for tools inside the kitchen and one, lower standard for tool out on the grill. This set changed that, these are solid, high quality, pass down to your kids and grandkids type tools. Goos weight and balance, handling slippery bratwurst and odd shaped hunks of meat with confidence all while keeping my hands away from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: sharpstick

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty SS BBQ Tools
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described by seller. The BBQ tools are heavy duty stainless steel well made. I used the tongs and spatula, they are comfortable to hold and use. Have not used the fork yet, but I don't see any reason, why it would not perform. I recommend this product to any BBQ pros pr novice.
customer_reviews.author: Jai T. Doshi

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty awesome. When you wash the brush make sure to remove the rubber part and let it dry as water can accumulate there and rust. Very happy, this is the best set I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, durable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Dad for his birthday and he loves them. Said I shouldn't have spent so much money.....I didn't! Good deal for high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be of great quality. Especially enjoy the rubber grip on the back of the utensils for added grip and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT!!! Sooo sturdy and the look terrific. Because they are so well made they are east to use and wash up like a dream. I would definitely recommend b

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grilling tools.
customer_reviews.text: We used these grilling tools the same day we received them. They arrived earlier than expected. They are very sturdy and so easy to clean. Perfect! Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Great barbecue toolset.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his barbecue toolset. And for me they’re ver easy to clean. So strong and durable. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, substantial tools
customer_reviews.text: These look to be very well made of heavy gauge stainless steel and are fully featured (eg. serrated edge on the spatula, bottle opener built in). I just received them and look forward to using them this weekend. Great experience. I would not hesitate to do business with this seller in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: These are super high quality. Nice and thick. Large. Durable. I was going to buy some cheaper ones on Amazon but they all had sketchy reviews- this one is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend when he got a new grill. He said they work great! He hasn’t had any issues with them. They appeared very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling tools.
customer_reviews.text: These things are heavy duty. Great grilling tool set. Well worth the price and much better than many of the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great set of BBQ Tools
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the new set of BBQ tools. They work very well. The tongs are strong enough to grip everything he’s made.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Callihan

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance
customer_reviews.text: After doing a ridiculous amount of searching for the right grilling utensils I finally settled upon these and do not regret my decision. Very sturdy, easy to clean, manageable, good length, all around a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gillin

product_meta.title: Alpha Grillers Heavy Duty BBQ Grilling Tools Set. Extra Thick Stainless Steel Spatula, Fork, Basting Brush & Tongs. Gift Box Package. Best for Barbecue & Grill. 18 Inch Utensils Turner Accessories
feature_bullets: BBQ TOOLS OF EPIC PROPORTIONS. Extra thick. Solid stainless steel. You'll be amazed how sturdy each tool feels in your hand. Easily skewer, grab or flip whole chickens, racks and briskets. Never worry about your tools bending, breaking or rusting again. Huge reach lets you get right to the back of the grill without singing your arms. With these trusty utensils at your side get ready to make short work of even the most fully loaded grill, and get back to the party!

EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY. ELEGANT DESIGN. As soon you remove these deluxe tools from the gift box quality packaging, you'll immediately notice the perfect heft and comfortable contoured rubber grips. The fork and spatula are each made of a single long piece of beautifully brushed stainless steel, while the tongs consist of 2 pieces joined together at a spring loaded hinge. With these tools you will not only own the grill, but also look good doing it!

EVERYTHING YOU NEED. NOTHING YOU DON'T. Huge hanging loops and tongs that lock shut to save you space and hassle. Massive spatula head for flipping even the biggest burgers. Serrated cutting edge equal to any steak knife for slicing open your meat or scraping it away from a sticky grate. Super sharp fork tines for skewering. Scalloped tongs to allow handling of delicate foods, like fish, without tearing. Even a bottle opener to make sure the Grill Master is always hydrated!

PERFECT FOR ALL GRILLS AND KITCHEN. Large or small. Gas, charcoal, infra red, electric, propane or rotisserie. Cast iron, steel or ceramic. Indoor or outdoor. These utensils work on em all! They are even great for indoor kitchen use, particularly the tongs. A perfect accessory for cooking, baking or making salads. This set is also great for camping outdoors. Portable, professional, an excellent gift for men. When you are done, chuck each utensil in the dishwasher and they'll be good as new!

LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We are so confident you will love these barbecue accessories that every purchase comes with a lifetime bulletproof guarantee. Any issue at all, just let us know and we'll fully refund your order. You won't find this level of service with the big brands like Weber, Char Broil and Cuisinart.
